name: Artificial Intelligence A-Zâ„¢: Learn How To Build An AI
author: Hitesh Rana
description: Combine the power of Data Science, Machine Learning and Deep Learning to create powerful AI for Real-World applications! Deep Convolutional Q-Learning. Master the State of the Art AI models. Understand the theory behind Artificial Intelligence

name: The Complete 2022 Web Development Bootcamp
author: Angelena Joshi
description: Become a Full-Stack Web Developer with just ONE course. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, React, MongoDB, Web3 and DApps. Learn HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JS (ES6+), Python, Wagtail CMS, PHP and MySQL all from scratch. Wagtail Pythons top Content Management System (Like WordPress, but better)

name: The Complete Ethical Hacking Course: Beginner to Advanced!
author: Jonny Harish
description: Learn how to do ethical hacking, penetration testing, web testing, and wifi hacking using kali linux! Learn Ethical Hacking from scratch & All 5 phases of Penetration Testing. Setting up your Hacking Lab: Kali Linux and Virtual Machines (Works with Windows/Mac/Linux) Learn Python from scratch so you are able to write your own tools for ethical hacking. Learn how to bypass Firewalls & Intrusion Detection System with Advanced Scanning

name: Digital Photography for Beginners with DSLR cameras
author: Robert Hudda
description: Learn how to take stunning photographs by mastering both the technical and creative sides of digital photography. Instructions on how to hold your camera correctly, which will help you to get sharp photographs. The necessary confidence to change the most important camera settings correctly at the right time, which will allow you to get perfect photos every time. The skill to spot creative photographic opportunities that will make your photos stand out from the rest.

name: Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D
author: Rick Davidson
description: Learn Unity in C# & Code Your First Five 2D Video Games for Web, Mac & PC. The Tutorials Cover Tilemap. Build a solid foundation for game design and game development that will help you build your own games. Create playable game projects - good for your portfolio, or just for your own sense of achievement. Develop highly transferable coding problem solving skills.

name: Selenium 4 WebDriver with Java(Basics + Advance + Architect)
author: Rahul Arora
description: By the End of the course you will be as much trained to automate any web based application using Selenium. You should be able to work with utilities like: ANT, MAVEN, JENKINS, DOCKERS, GRID for Parallel Execution, LOG4J API, JAVAMAIL API, APACHE POI API, JDBC, you should be able to Master Selenium Automation & crack any interview. Many pdf files, course code & other reference material will be provided along with the video lectures, By the end of this course you should be able to design major frameworks from scratch like: Data Driven, Keyword Driven, Hybrid, Page Object Model
